painting.artist_details: A good vegetable platter is a staple of any finger-food based buffet,

painting.name: Folk Acrylic
painting.description: A good vegetable platter is a staple of any finger-food based buffet, but how often do you hit a graduation party or a concert reception only to find the same old stale, sorry-looking, dried-out carrot sticks, celery sticks, cucumbers, and if you're lucky, bell pepper strips all sitting listlessly around a tub of store-bought Ranch dressing?
